recipe.title: Marshmallow Creme-Hot Fudge Sundaes
instructions: Combine chocolate, cocoa powder, and espresso in a large metal bowl. Bring cream just to a simmer in a small saucepan over medium heat; pour over chocolate mixture. Let sit for 30 seconds, then whisk until smooth and glossy. Fold marshmallow creme into chocolate. DO AHEAD:Can be made 3 days ahead. Let cool, cover, and chill. Rewarm before serving. Serve warm sauce over ice cream.
